channel.title: Behnam Azizi's Codeblog
channel.description: A place for coders, hackers and script kiddies!

item.title: My very first post
item.description:
This is my very first post. In here I will be blogging about my interesting technical experiences. Here are some topics I will be blogging about:

  • New programming languages and technologies
  • Interesting programming puzzles and their solutions
  • Scripts that make daily tasks easy
  • Good software development practices
  • â€¦
